**CMHC TBIPS Bid Solicitation for Informatics Services**
====================================================================

**Contract Number:** CB-662-33798396
**Solicitation Number:** RFx002478
**Amendment Number:** 4
**Publication Date:** November 3, 2023
**Closing Date:** November 20, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
**Contract Start Date:** December 4, 2023
**Contract End Date:** December 3, 2026

**Bid Opportunity:** Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC) invites bids from qualified service providers to deliver task-based informatics professional services (TBIPS) under the TBIPS supply arrangement (SA) method.

**Bid Description:**
This bid solicitation aims to meet CMHC's requirement for IT security and privacy analysis services. The successful service provider will deliver two (2) one-year contracts, with options to extend, to support the following categories:

1. C.3 IT Security TRA and C&A Analyst - Junior
2. C.3 IT Security TRA and C&A Analyst - Intermediate
3. C.3 IT Security TRA and C&A Analyst - Senior
4. C.16 PIA Specialist - Intermediate
5. C.16 PIA Specialist - Senior

**Security Clearance:** FSC - Secret
**Security Requirements:** Protected B - DOS

**Project Location:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**Bid Evaluation:**
Bids will be evaluated based on the combined rating of technical merit and price. The service provider must have demonstrated expertise in IT security and privacy analysis services.

**Preferable Contract Scope:**
The service provider must meet the following requirements:

* C.3 IT Security TRA and C&A Analyst - Junior, Intermediate, and Senior
* C.16 PIA Specialist - Intermediate and Senior

**Bid Submissions:**
Bid submissions should include a clear description of the service provider's approach, methodology, and timeline. The bid submission deadline is November 20, 2023, 2:00 PM EST.

**Inquiries:**
For questions or clarification regarding the bid solicitation, please contact:

Christine Brown, CMHC
ccbrown@cmhc-schl.gc.ca
(613) 748-2534

**Terms and Conditions:**
Please consult the bid solicitation package for details on bid submission requirements, evaluation criteria, and contract terms and conditions. All inquiries shall be sent in writing to Christine Brown, CMHC.
